scripts.clean: rm -rf playwright-report test-results && mkdir -p playwright-report test-results
scripts.debug: npm run clean && ENV=dev npx playwright test --ui --project=OrangeHRM-UI-Tests
scripts.test: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --workers=4 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:chrome: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Chrome-Desktop --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Firefox-Desktop --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:safari: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Safari-Desktop --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:edge: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Edge-Windows --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:mobile: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Chrome-Mobile --project=OrangeHRM-Safari-Mobile --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:tablet: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-iPad --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:cross-browser: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Chrome-Desktop --project=OrangeHRM-Firefox-Desktop --project=OrangeHRM-Safari-Desktop --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:all-platforms: npm run clean && ENV=dev NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --workers=5 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean && ENV=dev HEADLESS=false npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Chrome-Desktop --workers=1 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:headless: npm run clean && ENV=dev HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --project=OrangeHRM-Chrome-Desktop --workers=2 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && ENV=ci NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect --max-old-space-size=4096' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --workers=1 --trace on --max-failures=0
scripts.test:ci-sharded: npm run clean && ENV=ci NODE_OPTIONS='--no-inspect --max-old-space-size=4096' npx playwright test --grep '@OrangeHRM' --workers=1 --trace on --max-failures=0
